column4: Quick question, if I restart during the format part of the install process, does that ruin the hard drive
it cant be good - -but i doubt it would ruin it
Didn't think it would be good, but I realised I had to remove the RAID settings...
So I had to quit it...
if i were you -- i would go back, erase all your partitions and start over
I tried to install Ubuntu after that, but the format process bar started where it left off, but didn't move. What you think?
did you remove all the partitions?
I'm going guided, use whole disk
wait till someone more qualified can help you
i could do it on my own on my system -- but to try to walk you through it
im not sure i can help
Well, it won't hurt to try it using manual, will it? I have nothing to lose :)
